trans-unit.source: Provides a way for task authors to use a subset of the functionality of the [!INCLUDE[vstecmsbuild](~/add/includes/vstecmsbuild-md.md)] engine.

IBuildEngine2 extends <xref:Microsoft.Build.Framework.IBuildEngine>, allowing you to build multiple project files in parallel on systems containing multiple processors, or processors with multiple cores.
Initiates a build of a project file.
If the build is successful, the outputs of the specified targets are returned, if any exist.
If no targets are specified, [!INCLUDE[vstecmsbuild](~/add/includes/vstecmsbuild-md.md)] builds the default targets of the project.
Target outputs are returned as <xref:Microsoft.Build.Framework.ITaskItem> arrays indexed by target name.
The name of the project file to build.
The names of the target in the project to build.
Separate multiple targets with a semicolon (;).
<xref uid="langword_csharp_Null" name="Null" href=""></xref> values are acceptable.
An <xref:System.Collections.IDictionary> of additional global properties to apply to the project.
The key and value must be <xref uid="langword_csharp_String" name="String" href=""></xref> data types.
The outputs of each specified target.
<xref uid="langword_csharp_Null" name="Null" href=""></xref> values are acceptable.
Default value = "3.5."
Specifies the Toolset version for the build to use.
<xref uid="langword_csharp_Null" name="Null" href=""></xref> values are acceptable.
<xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the build was successful; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
Allows tasks to initiate parallel builds of the specified project files on systems with multiple processors or multiple core processors.
If the builds are successful, the outputs of the specified targets are returned, if any exist.
Both `targetNames` and `targetOutputs` accept `null` values.
If no targets are specified, then the default targets are built.
Target outputs are returned as <xref:Microsoft.Build.Framework.ITaskItem> arrays indexed by target name.
The names of the project files to build.
The names of the targets in the project to build.
Separate multiple targets with a semicolon (;).
<xref uid="langword_csharp_Null" name="Null" href=""></xref> values are acceptable.
An <xref:System.Collections.IDictionary> of additional global properties to apply to the project.
The key and value must be <xref uid="langword_csharp_String" name="String" href=""></xref> data types.
Array entries can be <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref>.
The outputs of each specified target.
<xref uid="langword_csharp_Null" name="Null" href=""></xref> values are acceptable.
Default value = "3.5."
Specifies the Toolset version for the build to use.
<xref uid="langword_csharp_Null" name="Null" href=""></xref> values are acceptable.
If <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>, the operation runs only if the cache does not already contain the result.
After the operation the result is stored in the cache.
If <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> the project is unloaded once the operation completes.
<xref uid="langword_csharp_True" name="True" href=""></xref> if the build succeeded, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref> if otherwise.
Returns whether the system is running in single- or multi-processor mode.
The build engine is in single-processor mode (`IsRunningMultipleNodes` = `false`) when it is initialized with the number of CPUs equal to 1 and the build engine is not a child engine.
The build engine is in multi-processor mode (`IsRunningMultipleNodes` = `true`) when it is initialized with a number of CPUs greater than 1, or when the build engine is a child engine.
<xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the system is running in multi-processor mode, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref> otherwise.
